text: I am going.
Je vais.
I am going to go.
Je vais aller.
I am going to go there.
Je vais y aller.
I'm going to go there later.
Je vais y aller plus tard.
He's going to go there this evening.
Il va y aller ce soir.
He's going to go there tomorrow.
Il va y aller demain.
You, informal, are going to go there tomorrow evening.
Tu vas y aller demain soir.
You, informal, aren't going to go there tomorrow evening.
Tu ne vas pas y aller demain soir.
You, formal, are going to go there.
Vous allez y aller.
You, informal, are going to go there tomorrow evening.
You, informal, are going to go there tomorrow evening.
You, informal, are going to go there tomorrow evening.
You, informal, are going to go there tomorrow evening.
You, informal, are going to go there tomorrow evening.
You, informal, are going to go there tomorrow morning.
You, informal, are going to go there tomorrow evening.
You, informal, are going to go there tomorrow morning.
